body:
I remember this happened last year, we changed the name of maps because upcoming was Halloween. (Like Justice became Injustice), Is that happening this year? ;P

Also anyone going out or giving candy this year? XD
body_tagged:

title: Halloween Map name changes?

replies.body: Hopefully that was cool last time. Maybe a plugin could be implemented where credits are replaced with candy for the month around Halloween. The candy could be worth double the amount that credits are. Just an idea, thought it would be fun ;D
replies.body_tagged: Hopefully that was cool last time. Maybe a plugin could be implemented where credits are replaced with candy for the month around Halloween. The candy could be worth double the amount that credits are. Just an idea, thought it would be fun ;D

replies.body: Why don't I remember any changes last year...
